extendedInfo.description: If you are Olly Murs's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Olly Murs's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Olly Murs's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Olly Murs's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Olly Murs- In Case You Didn't Know- Right Place Right Time************************List of lyrics ************************- A Million More Years- Accidental- Anywhere Else- Army Of Two- Ask Me To Stay- Busy- Change Is Gonna Come- Cry Your Heart Out- Dance With Me Tonight- Dear Darlin'- Don't Say Goodbye- Hand On Heart- Head To Toe- Heart On My Sleeve- Heart Skips A Beat- Hey You, Beautiful- Hold On- I Blame Hollywood- I Don't Love You Too- I Need You Now- I'm OK- In Case You Didn't Know- I've Tried Everything- Just For Tonight- Just Smile- Loud And Clear- Love Shine Down- Oh My Goodness- On My Cloud- One of These Days- Personal- Please Don't Let Me Go- Right Place, Right Time- Runaway- Sliding Doors- Takes A Lot- Tell The World- The One- The Perfect Night To Say Goodbye- Thinking Of Me- This One's For The Girls- This Song Is About You- Troublemaker- What A Buzz
